FRONTEND.LABEL: Front end
FRONTEND.TEXT: Very strong experience on AngularJS and getting more and more experience on Angular 2 & TypeScript. Besides that I also deal everyday with some of the most popular Javascript libraries and frameworks.

DOTNET.LABEL: .NET
DOTNET.TEXT: Extensive knowledge and experience on most of the .NET technologies such as C#, ASP.Net MVC, ASP.Net Web API or Entity Framework.

AGILE.LABEL: Agile / Teamwork
AGILE.TEXT: I believe team working is a key to a successful delivery. I have extensive experience working in Agile environments.

GEOLOCATION.LABEL: Geolocation
GEOLOCATION.TEXT: Applying geolocation to your business will be a very useful feature. Why don't we do it? I have very good knowledge of Google Maps API and all its libraries (places, autocomplete, drawing, ...).

RESPONSIVE.LABEL: Responsive design
RESPONSIVE.TEXT: Showing all your content in a proper way to your users is a must nowadays. I can help you with this by using Bootstrap, HTML5, SASS and new design technologies coming onto the market every day.

IDEAS.LABEL: Fresh ideas
IDEAS.TEXT: Besides achieving the requirements from the employers/clients I also like to suggest new solutions to improve the quality of the product. I'm not a conformist developer.
